name: Year 0: The War is Over.  The Battle for Survival has Begun
blurb: A post-apocalyptic turn based strategy wargame from a member of the original Tomb Raider team.

rewards.reward: SURVIVOR \u2013 Receive our thanks for being part of the kick starter programme.  You will be given access to an exclusive Year 0 screen saver as soon as the round ends and access to the game as soon as it becomes publically available.  If we meet the \u00a3100k stretch objective you will get a free version of the android/IOS app store application.

SCAVENGER \u2013 As well as the survivor level rewards you will also be given access to the Closed Beta test experience, toward the end of development.  You will see the game before anybody outside of kisckstarter and can be involved in suggesting changes before final release.

VETERAN \u2013 The full veteran experience will get you all the scavenger rewards above plus access to the game as it is RIGHT NOW.  It is still in development, with unbalanced game play and will be constantly refreshed but you will get the unique experience of seeing the game evolve over time and will able to contribute your thoughts and feelings during development helping to shape the final result.

CONTROLLER \u2013 All of the Veteran level rewards above as well as 24 Recon and Combat drones (12 of each) delivered as soon as the game is publically available and a USB flash drive with the Year 0 logo on it containing high resolution prints of all our concept artwork.   You will also get the title \u201cController\u201d prefixing your name in the game.  This cannot be earned any other way and represents your rank/position in the pre collapse society.

BATTERY MASTER - All of the Veteran level rewards above as well as 18 Artillery and Rocket Launchers (9 of each) delivered as soon as the game is publically available and a USB flash drive with the Year 0 logo on it containing high resolution prints of all our concept artwork.   You will also get the title \u201cMaster\u201d prefixing your name in the game.  This cannot be earned any other way and represents your rank/position in the pre collapse society.

TANK COMMANDER - All of the Veteran level rewards above as well as 18 Main Battle Tank units delivered as soon as the game is publically available and a USB flash drive with the Year 0 logo on it containing high resolution prints of all our concept artwork.   You will also get the title \u201cCommander\u201d prefixing your name in the game.  This cannot be earned any other way and represents your rank/position in the pre collapse society.

SQUADRON LEADER - All of the Veteran level rewards above as well as 24 Jet Trooper and Helicopter units (12 of each) delivered as soon as the game is publically available and a USB flash drive with the Year 0 logo on it containing high resolution prints of all our concept artwork.   You will also get the title \u201cLeader\u201d prefixing your name in the game.  This cannot be earned any other way and represents your rank/position in the pre collapse society.

GENERAL \u2013 All the Veteran level rewards plus 30,000 Resources delivered as soon as the game is publically available \u2013 more than enough to build your own attack squadron above and a USB flash drive with the Year 0 logo on it containing high resolution prints of all our concept artwork.   You will also get a limited edition T shirt exclusive to Kick starter in your size (S \u2013 XXL) showing that you are a project backer with the title \u201cGeneral\u201d on it.  You will also get the title \u201cGeneral\u201d prefixing your name in the game; this cannot be earned any other way and represents your rank/position in the pre collapse society.

FIELD MARSHAL\u2013 All of the General level rewards as above plus a limited edition canvass and wood framed art print of the cover image, this is exclusive to kick starter.  Your T shirt will have the title Field Marshal on it and you will have the title Field Marshal prefixing your name in the game, this cannot be earned any other way and represents your rank/position in the pre collapse society.

WARLORD - All of the Field Marshal level rewards plus a hand painted 6 inch Model of a Jet trooper.  Gav is keen to paint these himself but Ewan knows some professional miniature painters from his Games Workshop days so it will be your choice, though if we get a lot of orders at this level then we will have to outsource this to a factory.  You will get Warlord on your T shirt and the title Warlord in the game representing your rank/position in the pre collapse society.  You will also get the opportunity to start in one of the key major cities in the game (e.g. Washington, Paris or London).  These will be served out in backing order.

HEAD OF STATE - All of the Warlord rewards plus you will be invited to take part in the opening video filmed in a nuclear bunker.  After filming you can have dinner and a well-earned pint with the development team.  (Transport to and from our HQ is not included but we can get you from Nottingham to the film set and back).  You will also get to choose the title that goes on your T shirt and your starting title in the game be it Emperor, President, Prime Minister or King representing your rank/position in the pre collapse society.  You will also be able to choose your real world starting locations before the Warlord level backers.
